hero.savingsCalculation: €130K+ calculated: 30% error reduction (2 FTE saved @ €65K/year) + 25% efficiency gain (3hrs/day @ €300/hr) = €130K+ annually

sopra-steria-data-architect.focusArea: Transverse data architecture and center of excellence leadership
sopra-steria-data-architect.description: Building enterprise-wide data architecture center of excellence. Creating reusable architecture patterns and governance frameworks deployed across client projects. Training consultants on modern data platform design.
keyAchievements: Establishing data architecture center of excellence
Developing reusable architecture patterns for multi-cloud platforms
Creating enterprise data governance frameworks
Training consultants on modern data architecture best practices

businessImpact.description: Establishing architecture standards to reduce project setup time and improve consistency across engagements (metrics pending - new role Nov 2025)

onepoint-expert-data.durationNote: Part-time 09/2024-04/2025 alongside BNC, then full contract until 10/2025
onepoint-expert-data.focusArea: Modern and scalable data platform implementation
onepoint-expert-data.description: Delivered technical audits and architecture design for enterprise data platforms across Canada and France. Modernized data infrastructures with focus on scalability, security, and operational excellence.
keyAchievements: Conducted technical audits for 4 enterprise clients
Designed scalable data architectures for large-scale implementations
Implemented DataOps automation reducing deployment time
Delivered security-first data architecture frameworks
Trained client teams on modern data platform best practices

businessImpact.description: 40% performance improvement in data processing across client platforms through optimized architecture design
3 out of 4 clients extended engagements based on delivered value and expertise

bnc-analytical-foundation.description: Led team of 7 engineers building robust analytical pipelines for enterprise banking. Created innovative PySpark QA framework that became the standard for data quality across the analytics platform.
keyAchievements: Led team of 7 analysts and data engineers delivering critical analytical infrastructure
Developed PySpark library achieving 30% error reduction in production pipelines
Increased data processing efficiency by 25% through optimized pipeline architecture
Automated QA tests reducing testing time by 40% while improving coverage

businessImpact.description: 30% reduction in data processing errors in production pipelines through innovative PySpark QA framework (€65K annual labor savings)
25% increase in data processing efficiency across analytical pipelines, freeing 3 hours/day of engineering time (€65K+ annual value)
40% faster QA testing through automation, reducing release cycles from days to hours

technicalInnovation: Advanced data quality monitoring and alerting
Scalable analytical architecture handling billions of records

orange-hadoop-migration.description: Led zero-downtime migration of mission-critical data workflows to new Hadoop cluster. Modernized legacy ETL processes and developed productivity tools that became standard across the data engineering team.
keyAchievements: Supervised zero-downtime migration of 50+ critical data workflows
Modernized legacy Flume/Pig/Spark1/Sqoop workflows to Spark2
Developed Spark library achieving 20% productivity increase for data engineering team

businessImpact.description: 20% increase in data engineering team productivity through custom Spark library adoption
Zero-downtime migration of 50+ critical workflows completed ahead of schedule with no business disruption

orange-qoe-management.description: Developed machine learning models for customer experience prediction and management. Built automated analytics pipelines that reduced processing time and improved customer satisfaction metrics.
keyAchievements: Developed ML models predicting customer QoE with 15% satisfaction improvement
Automated analytics processes reducing processing time by 30%
Created NPS-QoE correlation dashboards for executive decision-making

businessImpact.description: 15% improvement in customer satisfaction scores through proactive QoE prediction and intervention
30% reduction in analytics processing time through workflow automation

orange-data-monetization.description: Built scalable micro-services platform for location analytics and population movement prediction. Architected high-volume data processing system handling millions of CDR records daily.
keyAchievements: Designed and deployed micro-services architecture using Kubernetes/Kafka/Cassandra/Spark
Developed location modeling algorithms processing CDR data at scale
Created population movement prediction models using SparkML

businessImpact.description: 3x scalability improvement with micro-services architecture supporting millions of daily transactions
Enabled new revenue streams through location-based insights and analytics products
